body_html:
Hi @on-the-run,
Is there any way to know if the CUDA remaps the memory mapping of the process ?
As said, I feel we see a similar issue, but the mlock workaround doesn't help in our case.
We also feel it's something to do with Pascal memory management (can't say exactly what).
Any clues to what we can check ?
Thanks !

body:
Hi @on-the-run,
Is there any way to know if the CUDA remaps the memory mapping of the process ?
As said, I feel we see a similar issue, but the mlock workaround doesn't help in our case.
We also feel it's something to do with Pascal memory management (can't say exactly what).
Any clues to what we can check ? 
Thanks !
